html:
shall he remain at Nob that day. The Assyrians will pause at the city of Nob, which is near Jerusalem, perhaps to rest, devise plans, and prepare for their attack against Jerusalem.

shake his hand against the mount of the daughter of Zion. Assyria might be shaking "his hand in threat against Jerusalem," directing particular attention to the temple mount and the house of the Lord, thus making a mockery of ancient Israel's chief religious symbol.
